author: AlohaTrader
body:
My site says in regards to the special NLOK dividend of $12:

Ex-div date: February 3, 2020

Record date: January 23, 2020

Pay date: January 31, 2020

author: bagamuti
body: Btw your NLOK is wrong, it actually hit 52w high today, got to know your dividends brah

author: cinemabrah2069
body:
Weird situation:
Had one single NLOK $23put 2/21.
Today the company had some kind of spinoff or special dividend, so now my option is for NLOK1, whereas the stock is still NLOK.

Apparently its still in the money and I’m eligible for an extra cash payout (the option is now worth $2300) but its Robinhood functionality is wonky and I can’t exercise it immediately.

Anyone have this happen before?

author: cinemabrah2069
body:
So from what I understand, NLOK issued a special dividend today where all options were split from the underlying stock and now appear as NLOK1.  The strike is multiplied by 100 and paid out.  You’ll notice the cash component as well.

How do I exercise this before expiration?  Only option is to sell, but I’m hesitant to do so as the “value” is 0.01

author: SP3NTt
body: Nlok dropped 12 dollars because of the special dividend exactly like I said it would and you argued with me

author: nostrautist
body: It’s a Norton anthology up in here

author: love2fuckbearasshoe
body: How is that NLOK$ 12$ DIVIDNET !!

author: CreditSpreadz
body: So your options became nlok1 which tracks nlok+12. All option buying selling seems broken on this ticker, none are reflecting correctly. Cant do anything but hope that gets fixed before expiration. What a shit way to pay out a dividend lol

body: Probably not ask angry as anyone with NLOK calls.

body: u/love2fukbearasshoe thanks for the heads up on NLOK, collected my $12 dividend today

author: pitrucha
body: Apparently $NLOK is going dividend today after paying 12$ on 28$ stock. All you had to to was to hold stock on 23th of Jan, the shares moved up 0.1$ since then.
